author: Staff Reporter
text:
The first day of the Brahmasthanam temple festival at the Mata Amritanandamayi Math began here on Saturday. A release says that the festivities began with the Udayasthamana puja early morning with ganapathy homam and mrithunjay homam. The puja continued till evening with sudharshana homam and baghavathy sevai.

Mata Amritanandamayi arrived on the stage around 11 a.m. after the chanting of Lalitha Sahasranama. She led the satsang, bhajan and guided meditation sessions. She then started giving darshan around 2 p.m.

On Sunday, the Brahmasthanam Mahotsavam will start with a special puja at 7 a.m. to mitigate malefic planetary influences.

There will be Lalitha Sahasranama chanting and satsang sessions.

For details dial 0422-2535258.
title: Brahmasthanam temple festival begins
